title: Update contact numbers and change experience to 2 years

requirements.summary: Update all phone numbers to 9630232599 and 9179142549 in Contact section, Footer, and WhatsApp button
acceptanceCriteria: ContactSection displays 9630232599 and 9179142549 as clickable phone links
Footer displays the updated phone numbers
WhatsApp button links use 9630232599 (or 9179142549 as appropriate)
No old/placeholder phone numbers remain anywhere on the page

file_operations.description: Update the phone number display and tel: links to show 9630232599 and 9179142549. Ensure both numbers are rendered as clickable links with proper tel: href attributes. Update any WhatsApp-related phone references in this component.
Update the contact details section to display the new phone numbers 9630232599 and 9179142549. Ensure they are formatted as clickable tel: links.
Update the WhatsApp link to use 9630232599 (or 9179142549 as appropriate) in the WhatsApp URL format (https://wa.me/919630232599). Ensure the pre-filled message includes the correct contact number.

requirements.summary: Change experience value to 2 years in About and Hero sections
acceptanceCriteria: The About section displays '2 Years of Experience' (or '2+ Years') in the highlights or stats area
The Hero section stats row shows '2+' or '2 Years' for the experience metric if that stat exists
No other year count contradicts the 2-year experience claim anywhere on the page

file_operations.description: Update the highlights checklist or any stats display to show '2 Years of Experience' (or '2+ Years'). Locate where years of experience is currently mentioned and change it to reflect 2 years.
Update the stats row to display '2+' or '2 Years' for the experience metric. Locate the current experience stat and change it to reflect 2 years of experience.
